JobProfileQueueGroup.name: JobProfileQueueGroup
JobProfileQueueGroup.description: JobProfileQueueGroup defines the mapping between Queue and JobProfile and configurations for capacity plans in Workforce Engagement.

AnswerTime.description: The answer time (in seconds) for a specific group.

CapacityPerJobProfile.description: The max number of work units that an agent can handle for a specific job profile.

GroupCapacity.description: The distributed number of work units among groups to which a specific job profile is associated.

GroupId.description: Identifies the group or queue record.

JobProfileShrinkage.description: The shrinkage for a specific job profile.

Priority.description: The priority of a group per job profile.

ServiceLevelAgreementPerc.description: The expected SLA percentage for a specific group.

WorkType.description: A type of group, indicating whether a queue is synchronous or asynchronous.
